## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                   | Type                                                                                         | Default    |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------------- | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------- |
| `size`   | `size`    | Defines the size of the icon. | `"4xl" \| "large" \| "medium" \| "small" \| "xLarge" \| "xSmall" \| "xxLarge" \| "xxxLarge"` | `'medium'` |


## Shadow Parts

| Part     | Description                   |
| -------- | ----------------------------- |
| `"icon"` | The component's icon wrapper. |
